projectGridLines.title: Title: Internship Program forDeveloping an Educational Tech Platform to Build knowledge  base from Engineering Experiences
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This internship offers an opportunity for students to work on an innovative

educational technology platform designed to capture and transfer the valuable experiences

of seasoned engineers to ku>aming employees. The platform will be used todocument document real-world

engineering challenges and solutions, focusing on specific industry sectors like

hospitality design. Interns will work closely with experienced engineers and develop tools for

knowledge capture and contribute toa system that ensures seamless knowledge transfer

within the company. The goal is to prevent knowledge loss when engineers leave the

company, allowing new hires to leverage existing expertise and reduce their learning curve

1. Understanding of software development (web and mobile apps)

2. Knowledge ofdatabases and content management systems

3. Familiarity with cloud services for data storage and sharing

4. Technical writing skills to document processes and experiences

5. Experience or interest in educational technology or learning management systems

6. Strong communication and collaboration skills

7. Experience with Generative AI (GenAI) for automated content generation,

knowledge extraction, and interactive learning tools

Expected learning:

Interns will gain hands-on experience in:

1. Developing and managing an educational tech platform

2. Collaborating with engineers tocapture and document real-world project knowledge

3. Understanding the nuances of knowledge transfer in an engineering environment

4. Working with industry-specific project data, particularly in hospitality design

5. Learning best practices in technology-driven knowledge management

6. Leveraging Generative AI for automated content creation, summarization, and

personalizing learning experiences

Specific courses required for project execution:

1. Software Engineering or Web Development

2. Database Management Systems

3. Cloud Computing

4. Technical Writing or Knowledge Management
